UserQuote.Name: Cersei
UserQuote.Quote: If you ever call me 'sister' again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep

UserQuote.Name: Tywin
UserQuote.Quote: A lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of a sheep

UserQuote.Name: Tyrion
UserQuote.Quote: Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor, and it can never be used to hurt you
